trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of security policy to apply to an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 指定要应用于程序集的安全策略的类型。

trans-unit.source: The HostSecurityPolicyResults class is used to supply the return value for the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostSecurityPolicyResolver.ResolvePolicy%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: HostSecurityPolicyResults 类用于提供的返回值<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostSecurityPolicyResolver.ResolvePolicy%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostSecurityPolicyResolver.ResolvePolicy%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use this method if you want to customize ASP.NET run-time behavior to override the ASP.NET code access security policy.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要自定义 ASP.NET 运行时行为，以覆盖 ASP.NET 代码访问安全性策略，请使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The enumeration value that is returned by the method indicates the type of security policy to use.
trans-unit.target: 由方法返回的枚举值指示要使用的安全策略的类型。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the permission set that is associated with the <xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref> instance should be applied to the specified assembly.
trans-unit.target: 指示与关联的权限集，它是<xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref>实例应该应用于指定的程序集。

trans-unit.source: This means that the assembly should be treated as a user assembly that is loaded into the partial-trust ASP.NET <xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着应将程序集视为一个用户程序集加载到部分信任 ASP.NET <xref href="System.AppDomain"> </xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the assembly should have the permission set that was assigned to the <xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref> instance at initialization.
trans-unit.target: 此外，该程序集应具有的权限集分配给<xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref>在初始化的实例。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that ASP.NET should use default logic to determine the appropriate permissions set for the specified assembly.
trans-unit.target: 指示 ASP.NET 应使用默认逻辑来确定适当的权限设置为指定的程序集。

trans-unit.source: You should return the DefaultPolicy value if you do not you want to decide the permission set for the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 您应返回值，如果这样做不是你想要决定对程序集的权限设置的 DefaultPolicy。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the specified assembly should be granted full trust.
trans-unit.target: 指示指定的程序集应被授予完全信任。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the permission set for the specified assembly is set to empty.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否设置对指定的程序集的权限设置为空。

trans-unit.source: An empty permission set is a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> class, with a parameter value of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.None> passed to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 空权限集是的新实例<xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref>类，参数值为<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.None>传递到构造函数。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.None>

trans-unit.source: An assembly that is associated with an empty permission set will not load in an ASP.NET partial trust application domain.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 部分信任应用程序域中将不会加载程序集与空权限集关联。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you can use the Nothing field to prevent an assembly from loading into a partial trust ASP.NET application domain.
trans-unit.target: 因此，你可以使用 Nothing 字段以防止来自在部分信任 ASP.NET 应用程序域中加载的程序集。
